title: Why are known felons, on probation, having been arrested for possessing a firearm by felon, assault by pointing said firearm and resisting arrest allowed back out on the streets?
text:
Are you speaking of a specific case, or just North Carolina law? The
focus of MyReporter.com is answering questions about life in Coastal
North Carolina. That's where we devote our resources.

If you're talking about a specific incident, let me know and I'll
pass the question along to the editor responsible for covering those
issues.
